name: Cube Master
description:
★Play against a friend in Multiplayer mode or test your strength against more and more challenging opponents in the Infinite mode.

★Experience the stunning visuals and an epic soundtrack that grows in intensity as you defeat more and more opponents!

●Learn to hold your own against the changing environments
●Master the different power-ups to use them to your advantage
●Simple and intuitive controls
●Play smart to counter the abilities of your enemies
●Outplay your friends or beat your high score in the Infinite mode - how many rounds can you last?
●Play offline - no internet connection necessary!

Are you the next Cube Master? Download and prove your strength!
